name: QuestCam (BETA)
summary: QuestCam Studio (BETA) is your virtual film studio in VR!  Use QuestCam, your all-in-one video creation tool for VR, to take 3rd person videos and talk to the camera like your favorite PC VR creators!  NOTE: QuestCam Studio is in BETA! We'll be adding more features, set pieces, and avatars in the future!
